name: Extinction - LD46 (Keep it alive)
description:
For a better experience, play on Chrome or Chromium

Press F11 to go fullscreen

Press R to reset to phase 1

Controls : 

  • Phase 1 : Left - Right arrow keys to scroll through the level, mouse click to interact with the level.
  • Phase 2 : Left - Rigth arrow keys to move the creature, Up arrow key to jump, X key to switch between creatures.

Ludum Dare 46 Jam Entry - Theme : Keep it alive

A statregy-platformer where you try to save species from extinction by guiding them to safety ! Prepare your escape by modifing the obstacles in the way of your creatures. 

Each level is cut in two phases :

  • Phase 1 is all about strategy : plan the espace of your creatures by looking at the obstacles and enemies, creating safe paths by using some of your units or points. You have one minute to prepare.
  • Phase 2 is a plateformer : once your preparations are over, you must help your creatures to escape their doom. Guide them to safety one by one to the end of the level.

One level is available with this entry

Credits :
